GOOS=<OS> GOARCH=<ARCH> go build -ldflags '-X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.version=<VERSION> -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.KubeVersion=v1.28.0 -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.ImagePrefix=image-prefix -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.buildDate=date' -o ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwok ./cmd/kwok
GOOS=<OS> GOARCH=<ARCH> go build -ldflags '-X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.version=<VERSION> -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.KubeVersion=v1.28.0 -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.ImagePrefix=image-prefix -X sigs.k8s.io/kwok/pkg/consts.buildDate=date' -o ./bin/<OS>/<ARCH>/kwokctl ./cmd/kwokctl
